sentences.en: "Mum thinks I should stop imposing on your hospitality, Leo," said Grace.
sentences.cn: “利奥，我妈妈觉得我不应该再在这儿麻烦你了，”格雷丝说。
“那么你就是列奥的女朋友了？”他大胆问道。

sentences.en: "Will you do this for me, Leo? It's the only way."— 'It's highly irregular. Ralph.'
sentences.cn: “利奥，你能为我做这件事吗？这是唯一的办法了。”——“拉尔夫，这么做是很不正当的。”

sentences.en: He stared at Leo with great bleary eyes.
sentences.cn: 他用一双模糊的大眼睛盯着利奥。

sentences.en: He stared into Leo's unblinking eyes.
sentences.cn: 他凝视着利奥一眨不眨的双眼。

sentences.en: I don't believe he would tell Leo such a thing.
sentences.cn: 我不信他会告诉利奥这种事。

sentences.en: Leo held himself to be a critic of craziness.
sentences.cn: 利奥把自己看成是一名疯狂症的鉴定家.

sentences.en: Leo is a materialist, living for life's little luxuries.
sentences.cn: 利奥是个物质享乐主义者，生活的乐趣就在一些小享受上。

sentences.en: Leo wended his way home through the wet streets.
sentences.cn: 利奥沿着潮湿的街道缓缓地朝家走去。
利奥，你写的那个是什么呀？
利奥，你来做饭前祷告吧？

sentences.en: On the death of Leo there were two main candidates for nomination as his replacement.
sentences.cn: 利奥去世后，有两个主要候选人被指定来接替他。

sentences.en: Say, Leo, how would you like to have dinner one night, just you and me?
sentences.cn: 哎，利奥，找个晚上一起吃顿饭如何，就你和我？

sentences.en: She was sure Leo was taking drugs.
The little boy stepped forward timidly and shook Leo's hand.
sentences.cn: 小男孩羞怯地走上前去握了握利奥的手。

words.tran_cn: 狮子（用于儿童故事寓言等）；狮子座；利奥（男子名）

phrases.tran_cn: 列夫·托尔斯泰（俄国文学家）

trans.tran_cn: 狮子（用于儿童故事寓言等），（天文）狮子座，[电影]灰白岁月
trans.tran_en: Leo is one of the twelve signs of the zodiac. Its symbol is a lion. People who are born between approximately the 23rd of July and the 22nd of August come under this sign.
